data.description: A smart, easy and powerful way for XML.
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
I think that it deserves to be registered, since the peoples like
    to use it, and I'm receiving every day e-mails being thankful for
    it.

    In my opinion it brings a new and better way to handle XML data.
    Well, is better to try it to know what it is, since it has something
    of a new concept. ;-P

    GMP.
